channel.title: Too-Late on Sriram Viswanathan
channel.description: Recent content in Too-Late on Sriram Viswanathan

item.title: Awake Are We Now
item.description:
Tell me the wise ways
I could be wrong
Stare into night space
Follow me down

Glimmering on the horizon
A thousand lights
Smoke in the air
The roar of a flight

Towards a dream
Towards a try
Is it more than me
And you and I

Awake are we now
Too late are we now
To start a new day..
